channel.title: AI Audio Academy
channel.description: Welcome to AI Audio Academy – your go-to source for learning on the go. Each episode explores a new topic, generated by AI and designed to teach, inspire, and expand your knowledge in bite-sized audio form. From science to philosophy, history to tech, we bring smart content straight to your ears.
channel.itunes:author: AI Audio Academy

item.title: AI with a strategy, part 1
item.description: An AI-generated overview of how quantum theory came to be — from Planck to Schrödinger.
